sections.heading: Overview
content:
Mark Johnson, RN, has worked in the department of emergency medicine at
Oregon Health and Science University for 16 years. For the past 10 years,
Johnson has specialized in critical care nursing and level 1 trauma care.
Johnson also works and sees patients in the Adult Urology Clinic at OHSU.

Working side-by-side with leaders in adult urology and renal transplantation
provides Johnson with greater opportunity to see and help many patients with a
range of problems, from the most basic urologic concerns to life-threatening
conditions.
